website_summaries.verdict: Tall campers, rejoice: Here’s a double bag designed for your long legs, at a very comfortable price.
pros: We liked that this bag easily unzipped into 2 separate bags when needed
An optional liner attaches quickly to 2 snaps
Insulation is just right for peak summer nights
cons: The detachable liner is too loose and can twist around restless sleepers

customer_reviews.title: Huge for two adults, great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use with my girlfriend, she really liked the removable sheet inside. I appreciated the zipper quality and the length at 6' tall 220#, but there is heaps of room in there for 2 people. You could add a 3rd person if you liked it weird.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Yay, both bags are the same length ...
customer_reviews.text: Same length means more versatility if you want to pull over head or fold over. Most doubles have one shorter. Very lightweight yet unexpectedly warm, but probably not for colder temps. Seems more like two comforters, with connecting zippers ... which is exactly what I wanted. Is grey with a hint of lightest blue on the inside, but steel grey on the outside. (I use it inside out, making it easy to slide on the sleeping surface.) The enclosed sheet is to me useless, but is a beautiful blue-green and will be useful for something. Always appreciate Coleman's zippers with the 'plow' feature. It is an actual 81" long.
customer_reviews.author: Netizen

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a trailer
customer_reviews.text: Can't testify to longevity, but we've used this on our last couple of camping trips and it's been just fine. Since we have a tent trailer we never know if we're going to be baked out or too cold. Thought this might be too warm, but it ended up being just perfect for the Pacific Northwest. The zippers work great and do not get stuck and being machine washable is a must since our dog jumps up on the bed leaving sand and fur everywhere. It also fit the bed perfectly so we had plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: ScoobyFan

customer_reviews.title: good bag, not quite as warm as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Not quite warm enough for my wife and I at 49* but with a fleece blanket inside it was fine. Roomy enough for my 6'3" fat self and my (Edit: not fat :) )wife. Only 3 nights in it so far but seems to be well constructed. Would be 5 stars but the zipper, while far better, is not as easy to use as I expected, you still have to be careful of snagging the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: lonn

customer_reviews.title: It is machine washable
customer_reviews.text: I have had several questions about being able to wash the sleeping bag so I took a photo for others. Hope it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: A snugglers dream
customer_reviews.text: We went on a ski trip and I used this for the first time. We slept on bunks at a cabin and this sleeping Bag was perfect to cover the whole twin bed and have lots of room to move around. I am 5’8” and it completely covered me. It was comfortable and warm. It is large, so if you’re looking to save space I wouldn’t recommend. But if you have the room or want something you can cuddle in I would recommend this sleeping bag. It does come with a great carrying bag that makes it easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Busymom_1004

customer_reviews.title: I love this sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this sleeping bag, it is great, Came with a little sheet that attaches, which is great. It is warm and perfect. I haven't used it with someone, but I love all the extra room. I must say it is a pain to try and roll it up as a double. But I just broke it into the 2 separate bags and rolled them.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Excellent double sleeping bag for 2 above average sized people
customer_reviews.text: Excellent double sleeping bag for my wife and me. We use it for our pop up trailer for our bed, and it works great. This is the best sleeping bag for 2 people who want a lot of space in one sleeping bag. You have about as much room inside this bag as you would have for two people on top of a queen bed mattress. This has plenty of space for two people of above average size, and keeps you warm in normal sleeping temps.
customer_reviews.author: rdsteve23

customer_reviews.title: Bulky , hard to store, not warm enough
customer_reviews.text: This Sleeping bag is comfortable but very bulky. It is also very hard to roll and put it back in storage bag (its quality is not good also). Not very warm and quality of inside sheet is not great either.
customer_reviews.author: Vnova

customer_reviews.title: Super nice & HUGE even when rolled up!
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is HUGE! Which I expected due to it being a double, but it is not as light weight as I expected. Very comfortable & I love that it unzips on both sides & that it has the sheet inside! I have zero complaints other than that I expected it to pack down just a little smaller than it does. And that's not really even a complaint, just an observation.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vickery

customer_reviews.title: Pin Fell Off...Bag Won’t Zip
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this sleeping bag about two years ago (May 2017). It is roomy and comfortable. It stores in our tent trailer and is used about three times a year. On our last trip, the pin broke off the zipper. The pin is the little piece that slides into the zipper when starting to zip the bag...without it, the bag won’t zip. So now we must sleep with one side open. Very frustrating development for an otherwise comfortable and pristine bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sacramento Simonson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Used this while ice fishing last weekend. All I can say is good things! This is perfect for two people and we were plenty warm! I love the double zippers so the person that's on the inside isn't trapped and can easily get out! Also, with two people this was easy to get tucked back into the bag. Will work amazing for camping and fishing! Can't wait to use it more!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sleeping bag. I bought a second for a friend because of how great it is! The inside has a toggle/loop connected sheet for when it gets too hot and the top sleeping bag zips completely down and up so one person isn't "trapped on the far side". This is perfect for camping or overnight stays when you don't want to set up a full bed. Fits my queen air mattress perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Meg B

customer_reviews.title: Great for one big person. Have not tested two people yet.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bag. I’m a big guy and haven’t found a mummy bag that fits me. I bought this considering I don’t Camp often and it’s not that cold in Florida. On first trip temps dipped into high thirties low forties over night. I was perfectly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Sleeping bag came damaged. It had a large tear in it with stuffing hanging out when we first opened it. The zipper wasn't sewn on completely. It also had several threads hanging off. Waiting on replacement and hoping it's made better. Apparently, Coleman has quality issues...
customer_reviews.author: Chanel Bella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all kinds of weather
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sleeping bag. We’ve had many nights below the (if I remember correctly) 45 degree limit and were still toasty warm. It’s also nice to unzip the top and just sleep with the sheet on warmer nights. Definitely worth the money and really nice quality. My one complaint is the storage bags has already ripped after just a few months of use, but not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rueter

customer_reviews.title: Delicate materials
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable bag. Washed it once on delicate and air dried. The material separated and stitches came loose. Ended up with a hole in the bag. Used it for one weekend. I really liked the bag, super comfy. If the material would have been a little more durable it would be a five star bag.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory G. Osland

customer_reviews.title: Comfy sleeping bag with a broken zipper
customer_reviews.text: The sleeping bag itself is comfy. The sheet in between the sleeping bags is an excellent added feature. I also like how you can unzip the bags and it becomes two single sleeping bags. After one time use, one of the zippers no longer zips.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and good size
customer_reviews.text: Took this brand new bag on a camping trip with my two small boys. It was freezing outside and we ended up not in our tent (as planned) but sleeping in a very drafty treehouse. We all snuggled into the bag (layered up with thermal underwear and sweatshirts) and stayed toasty all night long!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for couples
customer_reviews.text: Fits me and my girlfriend just fine. Good medium weight sleeping bag. Comfy and seems well made. Smaller and lighter than buying two separate sleeping bags for each of us.
customer_reviews.author: RobbyB

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room for us (without the dog)!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Kept us nice and warm except when the dog just had to sleep with us instead of on his bed. All 65 lbs of him. And he steals covers! If they'd had it in King size that might have been a better option lol.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: "Very nice sleeping bag"
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Keeps you nice n cozy. We're 5'9" and 6'2" and the length is great. Easy zip around without getting snagged. Can be used wth or without the attached sheet. Easy to get out of storage bag. A little struggle getting it back in, but we're using the ties that are attached to it to fold it up and store. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: hollotree

customer_reviews.title: this was by far the best option for me and my husband to comfortably sleep ...
customer_reviews.text: The elastics that keep the sheet in place are just tacked down and one has popped out of the seam. I wish the sheet was for both sides and zipped in, but for the price, this was by far the best option for me and my husband to comfortably sleep while camping or traveling with our air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Melrose

customer_reviews.title: Great for use in an RV
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for our purpose which is as the only bedding we use on a pull-out bed in our motorhome. It has a very comfortable lining and is not too heavy. Since we only use it indoors it is not used in low temperatures. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a bag to use for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: S. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Huge sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it is 66 inches wide. My camper has a large bed in it and this bag fits in perfectly. It’s very comfortable and, surprisingly, stores easily in the carry bag that came with it. The zippers on each side of the bag have never snagged or gotten stuck on the sleeping bag material. It’s great.
customer_reviews.author: brandon m page

customer_reviews.title: the sleeping bag is spacious and comfortable: 6'2" husband and 5'2" self
customer_reviews.text: Extra blanket attachment on the inside is a joke. Attaches with 2 buttons on the inside, so movement pulls and twists it all over. Without it, the sleeping bag is spacious and comfortable: 6'2" husband and 5'2" self. Warm and comfortable. And so grateful for the zipper on each side.
customer_reviews.author: RMJones

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept!
customer_reviews.text: We are thrilled with this purchase! My husband and I are headed up to Maine for a camping trip. Up to this point, we have been using a comforter off of our bed! We are just hoping this will keep us warm enough, as the temperatures can get down into the 40s at night in August. I will update my review after our trip!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing in the world
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing in the world. I must admit I haven't taken it out camping YET, but I use it in my home on my hard floors to make another bed on the ground ANYWHERE. I like to use it if me and my boyfriend are hanging out playing video games together or watching videos/movies in a room that doesn't have a bed to lounge on. It's so soft and cozy. Also my dog is in love with this thing. 5 stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Splatterdash

customer_reviews.title: Great size, came with a carry bag I can actually fit the sleeping bag back into!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! Great size, came with a carry bag I can actually fit the sleeping bag back into. I used this plus one quilt in 40 degree weather, by myself, and was quite toasty in a normal 3 season tent. Love the removable sheet inside as well! Only con is its hard to stuff into a normal washer.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: I was a bit hesitant at first because I thought there might not be enough room or that it wouldn't be warm enough but it worked
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I needed this for a music festival. I was a bit hesitant at first because I thought there might not be enough room or that it wouldn't be warm enough but it worked out great. It's pretty comfortable too. Definetly using it for our next camping trip. At night it got in the low 40's and it was warm enough. plenty of room for someone that is 6 feet tall and about 170lbs and someone that is 5'5 and about 130lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Ok but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Nice sleeping bag but a little bit short. A few more inches both depth and width would make this a five star product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy but the sewing was pretty terrible
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy but the sewing was pretty terrible. I had sew up about five different spots when I took it out of the box. The sheet is also pieced together (looks like the just cut it too short and added a strip). It is definitely not what I think of when I think of Coleman. I didn't return it because I know how to sew and hate dealing with the post office.
customer_reviews.author: jessica r beauvais

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is more like a bed than an outdoor normal sleeping bag. It's very comfortable and the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zipper came stuck!
customer_reviews.text: First time zipping it’s the zipper was so stuck it was impossible to unzip. My husband and I tried and tried. Put a hold in it trying to move it with pillars even. Still stuck and won’t move!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great, well made sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: GREAT sleeping bag! We used it camping this past weekend and it was in the 40's and quite windy. This sleeping bag kept my husband and I very warm. I think it would be fine in a bit cooler temps as well. It's heavy and solid. I like the fact that you can remove them to make two individual sleeping bags, if needed. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pushing Petals

customer_reviews.title: Comfy double bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this double sleeping bag. It’s perfect for outdoor camping. We used it on a queen air mattress and it was very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Not a quality product. Liner is flimsy and uncomfortable to use. Sleeping bag just doesn’t feel like it should for that amount of money. Not worthy of what the Coleman name used to stand for.
customer_reviews.author: K. Young

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I bought for camping. Went camping in oregon maybe about 50 degree. We slept in pijamas no sweater needed. Just wore a hat for our heads. There was room to move around. Both my husband loved this sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: It’s great , warm and roomy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sleeping bag it’s warm and comfy and sleeps me and my husband so comfortably it’s roomy for two, and I’d buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in the wash
customer_reviews.text: These bags were fantastic. Bought three of them for a family houseboat trip. Washed per instructions and they all have huge holes in them now.
customer_reviews.author: susan martin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We liked this sleeping bag so much that I ordered another for my son. So comfy and much more roomy than. Normal sleeping bags. I toss and turn alot which is a pain in normal sleeping bags.
customer_reviews.author: Orchid_wishes

customer_reviews.title: It was great for me.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my needs. I got the double because I can't stand being confined in a tight bag. Not sure about warmth. I was sleeping on an air-mattress, in a tent with a blanket under me and over me - it was only 50 degrees (so not even very cold). I was very comfortable, but may have been cold without the blankets.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: This is a great summer bag for 2
customer_reviews.text: great for summer camping as a couple not the best for hiking in but perfect for car camping
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for big and tall grandson and wife. Plenty of room and really warm. They love it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a warm down double bag with padding on bottom but couldn't find one. I was willing to spend a lot more. This was a perfect fit for our RV. Much easier than making and unmaking the bed. Spent two weeks in it and worked fine, even for my wife who is always cold. Glad we got it. No complaints yet. For the price can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: R Rex

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sleeping bag for anyone that is larger. It is definitely not for cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Zwick

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Hubby and I went camping, we had plenty of room, kept us both warm and cozy. We also use it as extra comfort as padding in the summer months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor material.
customer_reviews.text: Ripped in the washer on delicate setting. I never had a chance to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Just a Sleeping Bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this XL sleeping bag as a quilt on my bed. It's perfect for your bed at home. Really. Sound crazy? Some day you'll be doing it. It's better, tougher, and more comfortable than any quilt or duvet. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Axolotl

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting double  bag. Share camping.
customer_reviews.text: You will love this. Girlfriend and I use this all seasons. Has a built in sheet. It's a little heavy, and only for car camping for sure. Packs up, but it's big and feels like a brick. Washes easily as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kouri

customer_reviews.title: A must have for camping couples!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sleeping bag for two! Warm but not too hot! Also, if you are a "glamper" like me and want all the most convenient amenities, it pairs perfectly with a full-size air mattress. My girlfriend will never let me go back to individual sleeping bags.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb R. Levee

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big double sleeping bag. Nice for couples <3
customer_reviews.author: Rae H

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Quality 3 season sleeping bag that's roomy and comfortable. Used on 4 trips and very happy with this sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great in trailer so I don't have to mess with Sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: So great, we bought 2!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for sleeping with your spouse! I especially love that the sheet is removable from the bag so you can use only the sheet if you want to. It fits a full size mattress perfectly!! We use this on a full size bunk at our cabin, rather than making the beds with proper sheets. It's a time saver and just as comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Streby Family

customer_reviews.title: We love it! We use it in our trailer and ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it! We use it in our trailer and it is so comfy and warm. Size is perfect for two and sometimes a small toddler when they get scared of the dark!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Washable and spacious, two-person sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for one or two people. I slept in it with my husband while on a camping trip in Acadia national park this September when the temperature was as low as 45 at night with wind as well. Kept us warm. Soft. Washable. Has a sheet attached and is able to be detached. I'm glad this is the one I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the needs met. I use it because a dog keeps taking over my bed. Now we have 2 twin mats and two helpful xippers from each side. Good quality but 5 stars are reserved for top products.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: Great sleeping bag! My wife and I fit nicely with room to move around and not bother each other. I am 6 feet and 190lbs, my wife is 5' 6" and 115lbs.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dillon

customer_reviews.title: The built in sheet is genius!!
customer_reviews.text: Not for the light weight packer, but a wonderful bag for my wife and I. The built in sheet doesn’t slide around and adds a layer of comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Drew & Sharalyn Goodman

customer_reviews.title: This bag is fantastic. I love that it has a zipper on ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is fantastic. I love that it has a zipper on both sides, making it easy and comfortable for both people inside. Plenty of room, and the extra sheet inside of it is a nice touch! I would definitely say this product is worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: angela proctor

customer_reviews.title: Not so good quality
customer_reviews.text: Stitching came loose at bottom only after just a few uses. Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Tom L.

customer_reviews.title: ... some HEAT when fully zipped up and is also perfect unzipped lying under just the sheet
customer_reviews.text: This thing can hold some HEAT when fully zipped up and is also perfect unzipped lying under just the sheet. My boyfriend loves it also and if anything ever happens to this one I would definitely re-buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney&Jp

customer_reviews.title: This thing easily fits too non-gigantic adults
customer_reviews.text: This thing easily fits too non-gigantic adults. I love the sheet which is fastened to the top part, but is also easily removable. The top half separates from the bottom half, making it easy to wash in a regular washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Will fit upper bunk over driver on motor home. Also on short queen size bed.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Had a couple nights that hit mid 30's and 40's and kept myself and the wife plenty warm on a weeklong trip to the mountains.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is all as expected, and a great buy. It has plenty of room for my wife and I seems durable and is perfectly warm down to 35 degrees. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: NOA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for full size sleeper sofa.  Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for full size sleeperbed. Soft, soft, Soft. Very comfortable. I would not use it for cool weather camping outside. Too light weight. I see no purpose for flimsy sheet attachedwith toggles to it's inside. I removed it.
customer_reviews.author: nancypants1

customer_reviews.title: Best sleeping bag ever
customer_reviews.text: We tried out our sleeping bag for the 1st time last night. I loved it, I'm the one who gets cold and I stayed warm and comfortable. My other half was so warm he had to unzip his side and have just the sheet it comes with on him. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mazzatti

customer_reviews.title: We use this in the bed over the cab in our Class C motorhome.
customer_reviews.text: Making the bed over the cab in a class C motorhome isn't easy. You can really only reach one side. It is far easier to just use a double bag like this. Throw it up there and the bed is made. The zippers in this don't grab the fabric around them as easily as in most bags, it isn't too warm, and it even comes with a liner. We can easily wash one half at a time in our front loading washer after each camping trip. Work of advice: Don't get a bag rated for zero degrees unless it will be that cold where you camp. This one works great for us.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Its so nice to be able to cuddle up on spring and ...
customer_reviews.text: Looove this!! My hubby and I use it to go camping. Its so nice to be able to cuddle up on spring and fall nights when its in the 40s.
customer_reviews.author: Mel07

customer_reviews.title: We used it tent camping in Tahoe last weekend, super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Simple and comfortable. We normally sleep in a king bed, and when tent camping with an air mattress it was perfect! The sheet is a plus and we slept great every night. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Love this sleeping bag with lots of room for my wife and I. Zippers are very nice. Comes with a sheet that attaches to sleeping bag, which is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. It's roomy enough for myself and my boyfriend to sleep comfortably in. I camp in the summer time in Michigan, so it keeps me warm enough. I really like the sheet inside too. That's a great feature when you're sleeping in the warmer weather.

customer_reviews.title: Great for two people in cold weather
customer_reviews.text: This sleeps two people comfortably and kept us warm when it was 40 degrees out. the sheet that was included was a nice touch and gives you a little sense of being in a bed.

customer_reviews.text: This things is great! tons of room for two people. I am a big guy and my wife is quite small but it could easily fit two of me comfortably in it.

product_meta.title: Coleman Tandem 3-in-1 45 Big and Tall Double Adult Sleeping Bag
product_meta.description: Designed to fit 2 people, the Coleman Tandem 3-in-1 Big and Tall Double Sleeping Bag is a must-have piece of camping gear for couples. This oversize sleeping bag has a 3-in-1 design that can accommodate 2 people or be zipped apart into 2 separate bags. A 2-way patented ZipPlow system plows fabric away from the zipper to prevent snags and frustration. Featuring Coletherm hollow polyester insulation, this double sleeping bag helps keep you and your partner warm in temperatures as low as 45°F. A ComfortCuff provides additional coziness by surrounding your head in soft, warm fabric, and a built-in, detachable sheet offers layering options. Thanks to its Roll Control design, patented Quick Cord no-tie closure, and stuff sack, this sleeping bag is easy to roll, secure, and tote. It accommodates most people up to 6 feet 4 inches tall and is machine washable for easy cleaning.
feature_bullets: Double sleeping bag with 3 in 1 design can zip apart into 2 separate sleeping bags
Can accommodate most people up to 6 feet 4 inches in height; One size fits most
Coletherm hollow polyester insulation provides warmth in temperatures as low as 45 degrees Fahrenheit
ZipPlow system plows away fabric to prevent snagging during zipping
Roll Control design, Quick Cord system, and stuff sack for easy rolling, fastening, and toting
